attributes.additional_details:
Why Devolve when we can Evolve? The future of our nation's wealth is dependent on our unity. It is as simple as that. More government in the form of the Welsh Assembly and Scottish Parliament have will cost you thousands in the years to come- all to agree to unnecessary, anti-British policies. Stop Devolution now, forbid any independence referendum and claim your country back.

Yours Faithfully, Patriot
